discourse_list.title: Looking Ahead: How to Upgrade to Multi-Collateral Dai from Single-Collateral Dai

content.content: The Maker Blog – 23 Sep 19    Looking Ahead: How to Upgrade to Multi-Collateral Dai from Single-Collateral Dai Users and partners working with existing single-collateral Dai (or Sai) in the CDPs, or any other aspect of the Single Collateral Dai (SCD) system must upgrade to MCD upon its release.      I noticed we lacked a thread to discuss the recent blog post and I noticed some bleed over into one of the other threads. So with that in mind, if anyone has any responses or questions, please put them here.
content.GPT-summary: The post discusses the upcoming upgrade from Single-Collateral Dai to Multi-Collateral Dai and invites discussion and questions about the topic.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
